hero.name: Vikhyaat Sikand
hero.title: Amazon Ads Specialist | eCommerce Growth Architect
hero.intro:
6.5+ years in digital marketing & eCommerce advertising
4.5 years at Oswaal Books (eCommerce Ads & Influencer Marketing) | 2+ years at Physics Wallah
Proven track record in scaling brands, optimizing ACOS, and influencer marketing.
hero.tagline: Helping Brands Thrive on Amazon | Creative. Data-Driven. Impactful.

story:
My journey began not with privilege, but with purpose. From humble beginnings, I stepped into the world of eCommerce not as an expert, but as a relentless learner.

At Oswaal Books, I faced the challenge of building influencer marketing from scratch while driving eCommerce ad growth. Many doubted if a single campaign could spark a revolution, but I believed every experiment—every late night, every setback—was a step forward.

When I joined Physics Wallah, the stakes were even higher: high ACOS, limited profitability, and immense pressure. But I saw every challenge as an opportunity to build, innovate, and inspire. I rebuilt frameworks, tested boldly, and proved that with grit and vision, any brand can rise above the noise.

My story is simple: If you have the hunger to create real impact, you can rewrite the rules. I turned failures into lessons, ideas into actions, and dreams into results. Today, I help brands not just compete—but become unforgettable.

Success isn’t given. It’s earned—with courage, creativity, and the mindset to never stop growing.
expertise: Amazon Advertising, ACOS Optimization, Influencer Marketing, Creative Testing & Ad Framework Building, Data-Driven Growth Strategies

achievements.title: 300% Sales Growth
achievements.desc: Delivered exceptional revenue jumps for brands

achievements.title: 85% ACOS Reduction
achievements.desc: Lowered ad costs substantially while growing sales

achievements.title: 1000+ Influencer Collabs
achievements.desc: Built massive creator partnerships for brands

caseStudies:
Oswaal Books: Built eCommerce ads and influencer marketing from scratch. Led 1000+ creator collabs, resulting in viral reach and organic sales boost.

Physics Wallah: Transformed ad strategy, rebuilt frameworks, and cut ACOS by 85% while driving 300% sales growth.
quote: “Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.” – Steve Jobs

contact.whatsappMsg: Hi Vikhyaat, I am interested in boosting my brand with your Amazon marketing strategies.
